name: Folk Tales — #1 The Leopard Man
description:
Welcome to my new series on HEN, Folk Tales (from Around The World). There’ll be 12 artworks in total from 6 different continents.

I started this series with Africa and I chose this tale as I felt that drawing a leopard would be so much interesting.

The tale was about a handsome stranger strolled around in a village mysteriously. His appearance grabbed people’s eyes especially the maidens as they thought this young man was looking for a bride. But he always left the village without saying a word. Just disappeared into a forest.

One day, he came back to the village and one of the maidens really fell in love with him so decided to follow him back to the forest. As he realized he was being followed by the girl, he begged her to return home but she insisted to still follow. Turned out the handsome man was a savage leopard who was allowed to wander about in villages and towns like a man month once a month. Soon enough after he revealed his secret, he regained his natural form as a snarling leopard and chased the girl as if she's a prey.

Luckily she managed to survive. The leopard, disappointed of its prey, went slunk back into the forest. The handsome stranger was never seen again.
